Room.Name: Crystalline City
Room.ShortDescription: The advanced crystalline civilation lies before you.
Room.LongDescription: you see an entire underground world spread out before you. Hundreds of crystalline buildings can be seen, each shimmering in a different color of the the spectrum. Not only the buildings, but all of the inhabitants - every man, woman and child - seems to be composed entirely of different types of crystals. Each seems to glow in a unique hue.
